name: Oleg Tarasov

bio: Experienced backend developer with 3+ years of experience creating scalable web applications, APIs and blockchain solutions. I specialize in Node.js, TypeScript, NestJS and Web3 technologies.

experience.description: Development of DeFi platforms, NFT solutions, cryptocurrency bridges and blockchain applications. Working with Everscale, Ethereum, Solana, Polygon networks.
Creating fintech applications, P2P platforms, crowdfunding solutions. External API integration, microservice architecture development.
